languages.text: "Поскольку тело Вашей Светлости обнаружено не было, мы уповали на то, что вы каким-то образом все еще живы. Увы, самые зоркие операторы авгуров не засекли ничего подозрительного, и наш позорный провал поставил вас в ужасную опасность".

traits.locale_text: "Поскольку тело Вашей Светлости обнаружено не было, мы уповали на то, что вы каким-то образом все еще живы. Увы, самые зоркие операторы авгуров не засекли ничего подозрительного, и наш позорный провал поставил вас в ужасную опасность".
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never recovered, we hoped against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even our most alert augur operators never spotted anything suspicious, and thus our ignominious failure put you in dire peril."
languages.original_text: "Поскольку тело Вашей Светлости обнаружено не было, мы уповали на то, что вы каким-то образом все еще живы. Увы, самые зоркие операторы авгуров не засекли ничего подозрительного, и наш позорный провал поставил вас в ужасную опасность".

traits.locale_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never found, we were hoping against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even the most alert of our augur operators never caught sight of anything suspicious, and thus our shameful failure had put you in terrible peril."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never found, we were hoping against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even the most alert of our augur operators never caught sight of anything suspicious, and thus our shameful failure had put you in terrible peril."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never recovered, we hoped against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even our most alert augur operators never spotted anything suspicious, and thus our ignominious failure put you in dire peril."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never recovered, we hoped against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even our most alert augur operators never spotted anything suspicious, and thus our ignominious failure put you in dire peril."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never recovered, we hoped against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even our most alert augur operators never spotted anything suspicious, and thus our ignominious failure put you in dire peril."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never recovered, we hoped against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even our most alert augur operators never spotted anything suspicious, and thus our ignominious failure put you in dire peril."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, dado que nunca llegamos a recuperar su cadáver, contra todo pronóstico albergábamos la esperanza de que aún siguiera con vida. Por desgracia, ni siquiera nuestros augures más perspicaces detectaron nada sospechoso. Nuestra ignominiosa negligencia le puso en grave peligro».
languages.original_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never recovered, we hoped against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even our most alert augur operators never spotted anything suspicious, and thus our ignominious failure put you in dire peril."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, dado que nunca llegamos a recuperar su cadáver, contra todo pronóstico albergábamos la esperanza de que aún siguiera con vida. Por desgracia, ni siquiera nuestros augures más perspicaces detectaron nada sospechoso. Nuestra ignominiosa negligencia le puso en grave peligro».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “由于我们一直未能找到您的尸体，我们始终抱着一线希望，希望您还活着。遗憾的是，即便是我们技术最精湛的俄歇矩阵操作员，也没有发现任何可疑的东西。都是由于我们可耻的失误，才让您陷入了可怕的危险之中。”
languages.original_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never recovered, we hoped against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even our most alert augur operators never spotted anything suspicious, and thus our ignominious failure put you in dire peril."

traits.locale_text: “由于我们一直未能找到您的尸体，我们始终抱着一线希望，希望您还活着。遗憾的是，即便是我们技术最精湛的俄歇矩阵操作员，也没有发现任何可疑的东西。都是由于我们可耻的失误，才让您陷入了可怕的危险之中。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Dans la mesure où nous n'avions pas retrouvé votre corps, nous espérions que vous étiez toujours en vie. Hélas, même nos meilleurs opérateurs des augures n'ont rien repéré de suspect, et cette faute impardonnable de notre part vous a {mf|mis|mise} en danger. »
languages.original_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never recovered, we hoped against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even our most alert augur operators never spotted anything suspicious, and thus our ignominious failure put you in dire peril."

traits.locale_text: « Dans la mesure où nous n'avions pas retrouvé votre corps, nous espérions que vous étiez toujours en vie. Hélas, même nos meilleurs opérateurs des augures n'ont rien repéré de suspect, et cette faute impardonnable de notre part vous a {mf|mis|mise} en danger. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「陛下のご遺体が発見されなかったため、我々は陛下のご健在を願っておりました。残念なことに、最も警戒していたスキャナーオペレーターでさえ、不審な点を発見することができませんでした。我々の不名誉な失敗が、陛下を危機に陥れてしまいました」
languages.original_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never recovered, we hoped against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even our most alert augur operators never spotted anything suspicious, and thus our ignominious failure put you in dire peril."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下のご遺体が発見されなかったため、我々は陛下のご健在を願っておりました。残念なことに、最も警戒していたスキャナーオペレーターでさえ、不審な点を発見することができませんでした。我々の不名誉な失敗が、陛下を危機に陥れてしまいました」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Da die Leiche Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} nie gefunden wurde, klammerten wir uns an die geringe Hoffnung, dass Ihr noch am Leben wart. Doch selbst unsere wachsamsten Auguren haben nie etwas Verdächtiges entdeckt, weshalb unser schändliches Versagen Euch in schreckliche Gefahr gebracht hat."
languages.original_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never recovered, we hoped against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even our most alert augur operators never spotted anything suspicious, and thus our ignominious failure put you in dire peril."

traits.locale_text: "Da die Leiche Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} nie gefunden wurde, klammerten wir uns an die geringe Hoffnung, dass Ihr noch am Leben wart. Doch selbst unsere wachsamsten Auguren haben nie etwas Verdächtiges entdeckt, weshalb unser schändliches Versagen Euch in schreckliche Gefahr gebracht hat."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin bedeni bulunamadığından hâlâ hayatta olduğunuzu umut ettik. Ne yazık ki en dikkatli alamet operatörlerimiz bile şüpheli hiçbir şey bulamadı, utanç verici başarısızlığımızla sizi tehlikeye attık."
languages.original_text: "Since Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship's body was never recovered, we hoped against hope that you were still alive. Alas, even our most alert augur operators never spotted anything suspicious, and thus our ignominious failure put you in dire peril."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretlerinin bedeni bulunamadığı için hâlâ hayatta olduğunuzu umut ettik. Ne yazık ki en dikkatli alamet operatörlerimiz bile şüpheli bir şey bulamadı, bu yüzden utanç verici başarısızlığımızla sizi tehlikeye attık."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
